title: dataset_description.json
description: dataset_description.json is a top-level file that gives details about the source of the dataset, funding, and citation information. This file does not provide any actual description of the data.

title: study_description.json
description: study_description.json is a top-level file that gives details about the study, such as the name of the study, the authors, and the ethics approval number.

title: dataset_structure_description.json
description: dataset_structure_description.json is a top-level file that describes the structure of the dataset, including the names of the files and the relationships between them. This file does not contain any actual data, but provides a roadmap for navigating the dataset.

title: participants.json
description: The purpose of this file is to describe properties of participants such as age, sex, handedness, species, and strain.

title: README
description: This file should describe the dataset in more detail.

title: Folder Structure
description: This is a schema for a folder structure that is used to store a dataset. It is based on the BIDS folder structure, but is not identical.
